availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p:
Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Native of Germany. Married to Mary Dannecker. Father of Julia Dannecker, Alex Dannecker, William Dannecker, Em Dannecker, and D. C. Dannecker.
Attorney in Louisville in 1860 and 1865.

ab.bibl:
Edwards' Annual Director to the Inhabitants, Institutions, Incorporated Companies, Manufacturing Establishments, Business firms, Etc., Etc., in the City of Louisville, For 1865-6 (Louisville: Edwards, Greenough & Deved, 1866), p. 663.
The Courier Journal, April 11, 1896, p. 10.
